catalog_script_client.name: Fetch User Total Points

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6f20ed3e07350110ac9bf8ed7c1ed067
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fetch User Total Points</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var requester_points = g_form.getValue('u_reference_1', callback);
	
	function callback(requester_points)
	{
		g_form.getValue('user_total_points', requester_points.balance);
		
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ali.mohammed</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-24 15:48:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6f20ed3e07350110ac9bf8ed7c1ed067</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch User Total Points</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Green Swap Shop" source="x_762203_green_swa">f6bf51942f610110184155272799b66f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Green Swap Shop">f6bf51942f610110184155272799b66f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6f20ed3e07350110ac9bf8ed7c1ed067</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ali.mohammed</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-24 15:54:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
